library(tidyverse)

# Penguins Data

## row1 {.tabset}
```{r}
#| title: Histogram

p1 <- ggplot(penguins, aes(x= flipper_length_mm, fill= species)) +
  geom_histogram() +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(title = "Flipper Length (mm) Based on Species",
       x = "Flipper Length (mm)",
       y = "Number of Penguins")

ggplotly(p1)
  
```

```{r}
#| title: Scatterplot

p2 <- ggplot(penguins, aes(x= flipper_length_mm, y= body_mass_g, color= species)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_bw() +
  labs (
    title = "Flipper Length per Species",
    x = "Flipper Length (mm)",
    y = "Body Mass (g)",
    color = "Species"
  )

ggplotly(p2)
```
